pkgmetadata.longdescription: 'Rcpp' Implementation of Dirichlet Process Regression // 'Rcpp' reimplementation of the the Bayesian non-parametric Dirichlet Process Regression model for penalized regression first published in Zeng and Zhou (2017) doi:10.1038/s41467-017-00470-2. A full Bayesian version is implemented with Gibbs sampling, as well as a faster but less accurate variational Bayes approximation.
